lead_paragraph: The Anaheim Ducks fired coach Bruce Boudreau on Friday, two days after the four-time Pacific Division champions' first-round exit from the playoffs.

headline.print_headline: Ducks Fire Coach Bruce Boudreau After Early Playoff Exit
headline.main: Ducks Fire Coach Bruce Boudreau After Early Playoff Exit

snippet: The Anaheim Ducks fired coach Bruce Boudreau on Friday, two days after the four-time Pacific Division champions' first-round exit from the playoffs....
